scripts.say: Trying to find a safe place to fight while avoiding the fog definitely proved to be difficult.
Supplies dropping from the sky, and that fog... reminds me of that one game I tried playing with Long Island...
Falling from the sky like that is something I don't want to experience again... Ahaha...
I'm not sure why, but every piece of equipment that I found was a little different, with some being better than others. How annoying.
I know, right? That's just called RNG!
Ikazuchi, you really know everything, don't you? So smart~â™ª
Wh-what's your deal? Don't treat me like a cat! I only know what I know!
I don't mind if you dote on Ikazuchi, but... AI, you should have recovered the rest of your data by now, right?
Ahh... that's right! All right, watch me closely~!
Ta-da~! Super Gamer Kizuna AI, transformation complete~!
Woah... your ship rigging turned into battleship-type as well. Since we're all destroyers over here, our firepower just increased by a ton.
AI, you look super duper strong~!
Kizuna AI... battleship version... looks really strong.
Eh heh heh~ watch me closely, and I'll show you what being a capital ship is all about!
(I feel like she's going to shoot herself in the foot... but I don't have the heart to say anything... Guess I'll see what happens...)
